nodes.label: Photosynthetically Active Radiation (PAR)
nodes.description: Electromagnetic radiation in the 400-700 nm wavelength range traditionally considered for photosynthesis.

nodes.label: Far-red photons (701-750 nm)
nodes.description: Electromagnetic radiation in the 701-750 nm wavelength range, previously underestimated in photosynthesis.

nodes.label: Photosynthesis
nodes.description: The process by which plants convert light energy into chemical energy.

nodes.label: Leaf Gross Photosynthesis
nodes.description: Total rate of photosynthesis in a leaf.

nodes.label: Full Sun Conditions
nodes.description: High light intensity environment.

nodes.label: Deep Shade Conditions
nodes.description: Low light intensity environment.

nodes.label: Photosystem II (PSII)
nodes.description: Photosynthetic protein complex involved in light harvesting and electron transport.

nodes.label: Photosystem I (PSI)
nodes.description: Photosynthetic protein complex involved in light harvesting and electron transport.

nodes.label: Synergistic Interaction
nodes.description: Cooperative effect between far-red and shorter wavelength photons in enhancing photosynthesis.

nodes.label: PSII Efficiency
nodes.description: Measure of the effectiveness of PSII in converting light energy.

nodes.label: Photosynthetic Rates
nodes.description: Rate of carbon fixation during photosynthesis.
Contribution of far-red photons to leaf gross photosynthesis in full sun.
Contribution of far-red photons to leaf gross photosynthesis in deep shade.

nodes.label: Over 50%
nodes.description: Proportion of incident photons that are far-red in deep shade.

nodes.label: Plant Productivity
nodes.description: Rate of biomass production by plants.

nodes.label: Carbon Cycling
nodes.description: Movement of carbon through ecosystems.

nodes.label: Climate Change Impacts
nodes.description: Effects of climate change on plant growth and ecosystems.

nodes.label: Light Absorption
nodes.description: Absorption of photons by photosynthetic pigments.

nodes.label: Electron Transport
nodes.description: Movement of electrons through photosynthetic electron transport chain.

nodes.label: Photosynthetic Models
nodes.description: Mathematical models used to predict photosynthetic rates.

nodes.label: Crop Improvement
nodes.description: Techniques to enhance crop yield and quality.

nodes.label: Ecosystem Productivity
nodes.description: Overall rate of biomass production in an ecosystem.

nodes.label: Global Carbon Cycle
nodes.description: Global movement of carbon through various reservoirs.
